no_gold: No gold, no spark. Come back when you can pay.

no_damaged: All your gear looks sharp already.

room_entry.name: Labyrinth Ambience
dialogues: The air thickens as you step inside. The walls pulse faintly — alive, somehow.
Your torchlight flickers; shadows move before you do.
The scent of damp stone and blood clings to the air.
The ground crunches — bones or gravel, you can’t tell.
A whisper rides the draft: ‘Go deeper...’
charisma_high: The shadows dip as if to bow — they know you mean business.
A hush falls; even the stones seem to lean in to watch you pass.
charisma_low: The corridor snickers as you pass. You smell faintly of failure.
You get the sense the labyrinth has higher standards than you do.

examine_room.name: Examine Room
dialogues: You scan the room — broken relics, scattered bones, faint symbols.
There’s something etched into the wall, worn but deliberate.
The silence feels staged. Something’s watching.
You kneel to inspect a mark — claw, not tool.
You find a bloodstain leading nowhere. Old, yet fresh.

1.name: Circular Chamber
dialogues: A wide circular chamber with rough stone walls covered in faded ancient runes, bathed in a dim bluish glow from cracks in the ceiling.

2.name: Rectangular Hall
dialogues: A narrow rectangular hall cluttered with broken weapons and shattered armor, its air heavy with dust and the faint scent of old blood.

3.name: Hexagonal Pillared Room
dialogues: A vast hexagonal room lined with towering pillars of black marble, the floor etched with intricate geometric patterns that shimmer faintly.

4.name: Triangular Chamber
dialogues: A cramped triangular chamber where the walls close in tightly, lit by flickering torches that cast twisted shadows on the cracked stone floor.

5.name: Oval Gallery
dialogues: An expansive oval gallery adorned with murals of forgotten gods, where a strange humming resonates from unseen sources within the thickened fog.

6.name: Square Vault
dialogues: A small square room with low vaulted ceilings, its walls slick with moss and dripping water into a shallow pool pooling on the ancient flagstones below.

dragon_chamber.name: Dragon Chamber
dialogues: A massive chamber opens before you, its ceiling lost in shadow. Ancient runes pulse with malevolent energy along the walls, and the air itself seems to writhe with dark power. At the chamber's heart, a massive Dragon raises its terrible head, eyes blazing with corrupted fire. This is the fallen guardian—the source of the labyrinth's twisted reality.

You enter a colossal hall, its vastness dwarfing anything you've seen in the labyrinth. Twisted pillars of dark stone rise like the ribs of some ancient beast, and the very air crackles with unstable magic. In the center of this apocalyptic chamber, the Dragon awaits—once a guardian of reality, now a creature of pure corruption and rage.

room_entry.name: Labyrinth Room Entry
dialogues: A damp chamber with flickering torchlight.
Bones scatter the floor. A shadow moves.
Cold air spills from a cracked archway; something old breathes within.
Scratched runes glow faintly on the walls—fresh claw marks score the stone.
Candles gutter in a circle, recently lit. You are not alone.

examine_room.name: Labyrinth Examine Room
dialogues: An empty corridor lined with ancient carvings.
A collapsed hallway. You squeeze through.
Dust hangs in the air; distant water drips in a steady rhythm.
A shrine long-abandoned: cracked statue, scattered offerings.

before_opening.name: Trapped Chest
dialogues: The lock glints unnaturally. Too clean for this place.
You notice tiny runes carved around the latch.
The air near the chest feels charged, like static before lightning.
It’s oddly untouched — suspiciously so.
You sense something coiled beneath the wood.

triggered.name: Trapped Chest Triggered
dialogues: A dart whistles — too fast to react!
The lid snaps open with a hiss — gas fills your lungs.
The chest detonates in a flash of flame and metal shards.
A dark pulse knocks you backward. Pain floods your body.
You hear laughter echo from nowhere: ‘Greed has a price.’

disarmed.name: Trapped Chest Disarmed
dialogues: A soft click — the trap disarms. You grin.
The rune flickers and dies. Safe… for now.
Your steady hands save you from disaster.
The chest breathes out a sigh — almost grateful.

taunt_entry.name: Monster Taunts
dialogues: Fresh meat!
Another fool to feed the maze!
Your bones will decorate my den!
You shouldn’t have come, little hero!
The labyrinth hungers!
charisma_high: You glow with very bad ideas. Let me be your cautionary tale.
The pride drains from you like oil — tasty.
charisma_low: Sad little thing. Struggle for a bit, then stop.
Oh look, another mouth to fill.

hurt_reaction.name: Monster Hurt
dialogues: Grr… You’ll pay for that!
You think that hurts me?
I’ve bled worse from scratches!
You dare!
Still standing… barely!

enraged.name: Monster Enraged
dialogues: ENOUGH! I’LL TEAR YOU APART!
You’ll regret that strike!
I’ll crush your hope!
You’ve awakened my wrath!

dying.name: Monster Dying
dialogues: The Dragon's rage... it feeds us all...
This maze reshapes... but never truly dies...
Another will take my place... the betrayal demands it...
Three days... that's all you have left...
You'll never be... a true Explorer...

You try to drop it, but your fingers won’t obey.

equip_passive.name: Equip Passive

dialogues: You… didn’t make it? I see.

At least you tried. The gods favor effort.

startup.name: Startup
dialogues: So you seek to become an Explorer? Few attempt this path, fewer survive it. Each maze is a test - of skill, of will, of adaptability. The reality-warping corridors show no mercy to the unprepared.

The art of maze-walking is not just about combat or magic - it's about understanding how reality bends, how time flows differently, how space itself can be both weapon and shield. Each Explorer develops their own techniques, earned through trial and terror.

The corrupted Dragon that awaits will be your final exam. Survive its wrath, cleanse its corruption, and you may yet join the ranks of those who guard civilization's edge. Your trial begins now - step forward if you dare.

story_intro.name: Story Intro
dialogues: In a world scarred by ancient betrayals, labyrinths now erupt from wounds in reality itself. These ever-shifting mazes twist space and time, appearing suddenly at civilization’s edge. For three days they exist before collapsing, tearing rifts that unleash horrors upon the land.

To confront them, the Explorers arose—heroes who delve into these warped mazes, defeat their corrupted guardians, and seal the breaches left behind. Their victories keep the borderlands habitable, though their numbers steadily dwindle. Only those who conquer a labyrinth may join their ranks.

Now, a powerful labyrinth has appeared near Darsen, harboring a fallen guardian: a corrupted Dragon once bound to protect reality. With no Explorer in sight and time slipping away, the town turns to you—an untested hero whose survival may decide the world’s fate.

creation_complete.name: Creation Complete
dialogues: Your path is chosen. Now, welcome to Darsen - a town that lives in the shadow of the labyrinths. Here you'll find those who survive on civilization's edge: merchants who trade in mystical treasures, healers who mend reality-warped wounds, and veterans who remember what it means to face a maze's fury.

The townsfolk have adapted to life near the labyrinths, learning to read the signs, to prepare for the dangers, to support those brave or foolish enough to venture inside. Their knowledge might mean the difference between triumph and tragedy - listen well to their tales.

dragon_victory.name: Dragon Victory
dialogues: The mighty Dragon crashes to the ground with a thunderous roar that shakes the very foundations of the labyrinth. As its life force fades, the corrupted energy that twisted this place begins to unravel. Reality stabilizes, the walls stop shifting, and a golden light fills the chamber.

With a final, earth-shaking roar, the great Dragon collapses. The labyrinth's malevolent energy dissipates like morning mist, and the twisted corridors begin to straighten and heal. You have broken the curse that bound this place.

dragon_victory_2.name: Dragon Victory Part 2
dialogues: You have done what no Explorer before you could accomplish—you have defeated the fallen guardian and sealed the breach in reality itself. The labyrinth dissolves around you as you emerge into daylight, forever changed by your triumph over the darkness.

The fallen guardian is no more. As the Dragon's corrupted spirit is finally laid to rest, the breach in reality seals itself. You emerge from the dissolving labyrinth as a true Explorer, having saved not just Darsen, but the entire realm from this ancient threat.

game_victory.name: Game Victory
dialogues: VICTORY! {character_name} the Dragon Slayer has saved the realm! Your legend will be told for generations to come.
TRIUMPH! {character_name} the Explorer has accomplished the impossible! The Dragon is slain, the labyrinth is cleansed, and peace returns to the land.

game_over.name: Game Over
dialogues: {character_name}'s adventure ends here. The labyrinth claims another soul, and the Dragon's corruption grows stronger.
The light fades from {character_name}'s eyes. Another brave soul has fallen to the labyrinth's horrors, and the Dragon remains undefeated.
